1. Nobunaga was wounded and committed suicide at the Honnoji temple of Kyot=
o on 21st june 1582 after a fight against Akechi Mitsuhide's troups. The te=
mple was burned during the fight.
2.The reasons why Takeda Shingen pushed o=
ut his father Nobutora are not fully explained but it is believed that it w=
as a combination of personal ambition, bearing in mind the relationship bet=
ween father and son was not too good, and the growing insatisfaction of som=
e major vassals who resented the high-handed manner of Nobutora in his dire=
ction of the clan.
